kev575.advancedinventory

Class AdvancedInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • kev575.advancedinventory.AdvancedInventory

  • public final class AdvancedInventory
extends java.lang.Object
    This could be a milestone in the creation of graphical user interfaces (GUIs) using the Bukkit inventory API (Inventory, InventoryEvent and more).
    Author:
    Kev575
